post.body: It's right up there with all the good stuff in life sir. :{>
I started Monday. Thought I'd get a head start. Good luck! :{>
I was just awarded Disney Princess stickers by @EmmaLeonard. They're stuck to my right arm. Every day is father's day. :{>
LOL - @RileyLeonard knows how to turn on the XBox from the controller. :{>
Congratulations @KodefuGuru!
A thought: If consumer confidence is a factor in the length/depth of the recession, what can we do to positively impact that? Your thoughts?
It's a great book @jasonhammer - I wish I wrote like @cshirky. :{>
LOL @sqlagentman @BrentO @kbriankelley - great minds! :{>
LOL @BrentO @kbriankelley - great minds! :{>
And this is tweet 3,500. :{>
I just created a project on CodePlex! Unpublished for now. Maybe I'll get something posted today. :{>
Poll: With consumer confidence running low, how much of the recession is controlled by "we the people?"
One good thing about the stomach bug, I am kicking butt on my 2009 New Years resolution to lose weight! ;{>
Congratulations @wbm! :{>
Congratulations @RachelAppel!
Congratulations @alanstevens!
Ohno @jasonhammer! @cshirky started his (excellent!) book "Here Comes Everybody" with a story about how someone tracked down a stolen phone.
We will get better though. And thank goodness for good health insurance! :{>
Thanks @kbriankelley! @ChristyLeonard and I are both suffering from the stomach bug too. Not too healthy at casa de Leonard this new year.
LOL @wvhoki He gets a little help from us. @StevieLeonard and @EmmaLeonard typed their first tweets yesterday. (Drying a tear) I'm so proud!
